title: Three 4v5's in a row now in norms
body: Let me guess, something wrong with the servers again?

replies.body: How'd you start a game with 4 people on your team?
someone afks at the very start of the game probably so ends up being a 4 v 5
If they aft at the start, then you will go back into the matchmaking queue because a player has failed to select a champion.....
very sure he is talking after champ select is done?
You just assume that, it isn't clarified at all in what he said
It doesn't need to be clarified at all. If the match didn't start he wouldn't be talking about that he had to play with a team with 4 people.
I've had 6 in a row before (ranked ofc, ruined my whole fucking day).. i know a diamond who had 24 in a row and then quit league

Well I have noticed a increase in AFKer's and bot Script users....
Who knows?
Good Luck with that.
